item.title: Germany to Tighten Border Controls as Anti-Immigrant Parties Gain Votes
item.description: The government said it would expand patrols as part of a ‘hard line’ on illegal migration following two deadly stabbings by rejected asylum-seekers and a surge in support for the far right.

item.title: Watch: Comedian heckles Nancy Pelosi, asks which stocks to buy
item.description: Nancy Pelosi was unperturbed as a comedian approached her at a book signing event posing as a Democrat supporters and then ranted against Donald Trump before asking her advice on which stocks to buy. The comedian called Nancy Pelosi the greatest options traders of all times when he was restrained by Nancy's security details and was shows the door.

item.title: Community alarmed by man dressed in Klan robes at Trump rally in Mystic
Iranian missiles in Russia are a legitimate target, a Ukrainian official says
Trump said Mark Zuckerberg told him there's 'no way I can vote for a Democrat' after the assassination attempt. But Zuckerberg is pushing back on that.
The EU buys too much defense equipment abroad, especially from the US, a major report says
